content:
* Looking for a Senior FRONT-END Engineer opportunity *

Hi everyone - I'm a senior front-end(8 years)/React.js(5+ years) engineer with 2+ years of block chain project exp. I am looking for a new role and would appreciate your support. Thank you in advance for any advice, or opportunities you can offer.

Please DM me, thanks
